pages.text: 17|67|Ara sagare yakhana tomaderake bipada sparsa kare takhana sudhu tini chara an'ya yaderake tomara deke thaka tara hariye yaya [1]; atahpara tini yakhana tomaderake ud'dhara kare sthale anena takhana tomara mukha phiriye na'o. Ara manusa khuba'i akrtajna.

17|68|Tomara ki nirbhaya hayecha ye, tini tomaderake saha kono ancala dhasiye debe na athaba tomadera upara sila barsanakari jhanca pathabena na? Tarapara tomara tomadera jan'ya kono karmabidhayaka pabe na.

17|69|Naki tomara nirbhaya hayecha ye, tini tomadera arekabara sagare niye yabena na ebam tomadera birud'dhe pracanda jhatika pathabena na ebam tomadera kuphari karara jan'ya tomaderake nimajjita karabena na? Tarapara tomara e byapare amadera birud'dhe kono sahayyakari pabe na.

17|70|Ara abasya'i amara adama-santanake maryada dana karechi [1]; sthale o sagare tadera calacalera bahana diyechi ebam taderake uttama riyaka dana karechi ara amara yaderake srsti karechi tadera anekera upara tadera sresthatba diyechi.

17|71|Smarana karuna se dinake, yakhana amara pratyeka sampradayake tadera ‘imama’saha [1] dakaba. Atahpara yadera dana hate tadera ‘amalanama deya habe, tara tadera ‘amalanama parabe ebam tadera upara samanna parimana'o yuluma kara habe na.
17|72|Ara ye byakti ekhana andha [1] se akhirate'o andha [2] ebam sabaceye besi pathabhrasta.

17|73|Ara amara apanara prati ya ohi karechi ta theke ora apanake padaskhalana ghatanora cesta praya curanta karechila, yate apani amadera upara setara biparita mithya ratate parena [1]; ara nihsandehe takhana tara apanake bandhurupe grahana karata.
17|74|Ara amara abicalita na rakhale apani abasya'i tadera dike praya kichuta jhumke paratena [1]
17|75|tahale abasya'i amara apanake ihajibane diguna o parajibane diguna sasti asbadana karatama; takhana amadera birud'dhe apanara jan'ya kono sahayyakari petena na [1].
